points.desc: Model identifier
points.name: ID

points.desc: Model length
points.name: L

points.desc: Type of DER device. Default value is 4 to indicate PV device.
points.name: DERTyp

points.desc: Continuous power output capability of the inverter.
points.name: WRtg

points.desc: Scale factor
points.name: WRtg_SF

points.desc: Continuous Volt-Ampere capability of the inverter.
points.name: VARtg

points.desc: Scale factor
points.name: VARtg_SF

points.desc: Continuous VAR capability of the inverter in quadrant 1.
points.name: VArRtgQ1

points.desc: Continuous VAR capability of the inverter in quadrant 2.
points.name: VArRtgQ2

points.desc: Continuous VAR capability of the inverter in quadrant 3.
points.name: VArRtgQ3

points.desc: Continuous VAR capability of the inverter in quadrant 4.
points.name: VArRtgQ4

points.desc: Scale factor
points.name: VArRtg_SF

points.desc: Maximum RMS AC current level capability of the inverter.
points.name: ARtg

points.desc: Scale factor
points.name: ARtg_SF

points.desc: Minimum power factor capability of the inverter in quadrant 1.
points.name: PFRtgQ1

points.desc: Minimum power factor capability of the inverter in quadrant 2.
points.name: PFRtgQ2

points.desc: Minimum power factor capability of the inverter in quadrant 3.
points.name: PFRtgQ3

points.desc: Minimum power factor capability of the inverter in quadrant 4.
points.name: PFRtgQ4

points.desc: Scale factor
points.name: PFRtg_SF

points.desc: Nominal energy rating of storage device.
points.name: WHRtg

points.desc: Scale factor
points.name: WHRtg_SF

points.desc: The usable capacity of the battery.  Maximum charge minus minimum charge from a technology capability perspective (Amp-hour capacity rating).
points.name: AhrRtg

points.desc: Scale factor for amp-hour rating.
points.name: AhrRtg_SF

points.desc: Maximum rate of energy transfer into the storage device.
points.name: MaxChaRte

points.desc: Scale factor
points.name: MaxChaRte_SF

points.desc: Maximum rate of energy transfer out of the storage device.
points.name: MaxDisChaRte

points.desc: Scale factor
points.name: MaxDisChaRte_SF

points.desc: Pad register.
points.name: Pad
